headline: 2 Top Dividend Stocks to Buy and Hold Forever
summary: Let's explore some reasons why Realty Income (NYSE: O) and Dollar General (NYSE: DG) could have a place in your long-term investment portfolio.  Realty Income Corporation is a real estate investment trust (REIT), which is a type of corporation that's required to return most of its profits to shareholders in exchange for tax benefits.  With an annualized return of 10.8% between 1992 and 2017, REITs consistently outperform stocks and bonds, making them a great pick for long-term investors.
